trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_SEQ_00<tab>Klynthota has a theory that is out of this world.

TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_SEQ_01<tab>Obsessed with the lesser moon since it fell to earth five years ago, Klynthota found, then lost, a fragment of the hammer of the Calamity in the Singing Shards. Lurk there and ambush the elder hapalit with a pepper bomb, and thus regain the fragment.

TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_SEQ_02<tab>The bomb proved even more effective than you had hoped, and the fragment is yours. It is an odd thing to hold a piece of the moon in your hands, and an ill one at that. It would be best to pass it on to Klynthota as soon as possible.

TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_SEQ_03<tab>Overjoyed at her specimen's return, Klynthota reveals a startling find─that Dalamud was made of the same curious material as those abundantly found in Allagan artifacts. If she is not mistaken, the implications are dizzying...
TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_TODO_00<tab>Wait at the specified location, then use the pepper bomb on the elder hapalit.
TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the Dalamud fragment to Klynthota.

TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_KLYNTHOTA_000_000<tab>You are <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I am called Klynthota. Is it true that adventurers are bound to secrecy whenever they undertake a commission? Excellent! You see, I am here for a reason of my own─the lesser moon, Dalamud.

TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_KLYNTHOTA_000_001<tab>The others may burrow ever deeper in the ground, but I look to the sky. Five years ago, Dalamud flushed like the face of an old king most wroth before its swelling bulk fell to earth. I am...consumed by the desire to know more.

TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_KLYNTHOTA_000_002<tab>One of the fragments of the baleful satellite landed in the Singing Shards, and there I took myself and have been excavating ever since...until an elder hapalit came and seized the precious artifact!
TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_KLYNTHOTA_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I must have it back! It means everything. You must slay this hated hapalit and return the fragment to me.

TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_KLYNTHOTA_000_004<tab>I know its weakness well enough from that most dismal encounter. Here is a pepper bomb to use on the fell creature─it was only by flinging a basket of the same peppers in its face that I escaped with my life.
TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_KLYNTHOTA_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Did you retrieve it? Have you the fragment?
TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_KLYNTHOTA_000_030<tab>Ah, my precious specimen! There is much to learn, but see you this earth-shaking discovery of mine...
TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_KLYNTHOTA_000_031<tab>The fragment is made of no material known to Eorzea─save for that which has been unearthed in those Allagan ruins!

TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_KLYNTHOTA_000_032<tab>What if Dalamud was a thing man-made, created by the sons and daughters of Allag, then cast into the sky? This is a powerful piece of evidence I hold again in my hand...

TEXT_GAIUSC506_00994_KLYNTHOTA_000_033<tab>First the Crystal Tower, now Dalamud. That a civilization could exist capable of such creations makes my calculations shiver and all jadedness shrivel. Ah, it is a good time to be alive, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thank you for all you have done.
